channel.title: Changing the color of the floor of an area? [PI] [317]
channel.description:
Just wondering if its possible/easy to change the colour of the floor of an area. I just wanna brighten up my soon to be donator zone.
heres a pic of the area now

item.title: Changing the color of the floor of an area? [PI] [317]
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

The only way I know on doing this is using a map editor. Preferably the 3D one that Peter made a long time ago. Search it up on google.

And if you still can’t find it, then I’ll give you the link to it.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the color of the floor of an area? [PI] [317]
